titleStmt.title: A Declaration by direction of the committee at Yorke to their deluded and oppressed countrey-men also the letters with the propositions and articles sent to the Earle of Newcastle upon which he entred this county, and his answer thereunto : with observations thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Newcastle, William Cavendish, Duke of, 1592-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
